definition: Snake island viper (Gloydius shedaoensis), feeding on migrating birds

sentences.english: Circadian activity and antipredation behaviour of Agkistrodon qinlingensis are observed.
sentences.chinese: 本文觀察研究了秦嶺蝮蛇的活動節律和反捕行爲。

sentences.english: The samples of Agkistrodon from high altitude regions of both Gansu and Shaanxi Provinces probably should be referred to A. strauchi.
sentences.chinese: 甘肅和陝西高海拔地區的蝮蛇標本可能同屬於高原蝮。

sentences.english: Saxatilis Pallas and birds of the unique ecosystem The study also a great meaning.
sentences.chinese: 黑眉蝮蛇與鳥類的獨特生態系統研究亦具較大意義。

sentences.english: Objective To purify defibrase from snake venom of Agkistrodon acutus by affinity chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 目的用親和層析法從尖吻蝮蛇蛇毒中分離純化降纖酶。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe process can be used to purify rapidly the fibrinolytic enzyme from Gloydius saxatilis snake venom.
sentences.chinese: 結論此工藝可以快速純化黑眉蝮蛇蛇毒纖溶酶。

sentences.english: You'd have to go farther south to find cottonmouths.
sentences.chinese: 你要是再往南走點兒就能找到些水蝮蛇。

sentences.english: What are the tail numbers on the crashed viper Kara and Leobin discover?
sentences.chinese: 卡拉和李奧本發現的蝮蛇戰機的尾號是多少？

sentences.english: Objective Purificating no hemorrhage of fibrinolytic enzyme from Agkistrodon halys venom.
sentences.chinese: 目的從江浙蝮蛇蛇毒中純化出無出血毒的纖溶酶。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effects of snake venom antithrombus enzyme (VAE, ahylysamtifarctum) in severe head injury (SHI).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察蝮蛇抗栓酶治療重型顱腦損傷的療效。

sentences.english: What article does Starbuck use to identify the body in the crashed viper?
sentences.chinese: 星芭靠什麼物件來識別墜機蝮蛇中屍體的身份？

sentences.english: The results showed that it was possible to develop artificial raising of Pallas pit viper in Heilongjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，在黑龍江省開展蝮蛇的人工養殖是可行的。

definition: Deinagkistrodon, a venomous pit viper/also called five-paced viper (i.e. can grow to five paces)
lizard/common spoken equivalent of 蜥蜴[xi1 yi4]
